subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Iman Shumpert, Jason Kidd and Kenyon Martin, key supporting role players, combined to miss all 11 of their field goal attempts and did not take a free throw.
snippet: Iman Shumpert, Jason Kidd and Kenyon Martin, key supporting role players, combined to miss all 11 of their field goal attempts and did not take a free throw.
